SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw

Class Runner

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.Runner
public class Runner extends Object
Since:
1.9 The Runner is the main class of this application. It has the FileManager object associated with it which stores file names and file path names. The runner class itself does most of the work. The user enter the file paths for both a lexicon and twitter/X user.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eoin Concannon
See Also:
  • The program then calculates the overall sentiment from the twitter/X file.
  • processSentiment(ie.atu.sw.FileManager,ie.atu.sw.FileManager)
  • displaySentiment(double,double,int,double)

      Parameters:

      sentimentBad - is all negative numbers
